00042 //
00043 // KviWindowListItem
00044 //
00045 // The base class for the WindowList items
00046 // this is the only interface to an item visible to external classes
00047 //
00048 
00049 class KVIRC_API KviWindowListItem
00050 {
00051 public:
00052         KviWindowListItem(KviWindow * wnd);
00053         virtual ~KviWindowListItem();
00054 protected:
00055         KviWindow * m_pWindow;
00056         int         m_iHighlightLevel;
00057         int         m_iProgress;
00058 public:
00059         KviWindow * kviWindow(){ return m_pWindow; };
00060         virtual void captionChanged(){};
00061         virtual void highlight(int){};
00062         virtual void setProgress(int){};
00063         virtual bool active(){ return false; };
00064         virtual void unhighlight(){};
00065         int progress(){ return m_iProgress; };
00066         int highlightLevel(){ return m_iHighlightLevel; };
00067 };
00068 
00069 class KVIRC_API KviWindowListTitleWidget : public QLabel
00070 {
00071         Q_OBJECT
00072 public:
00073         KviWindowListTitleWidget() {};
00074         ~KviWindowListTitleWidget() {};
00075         QSize sizeHint() const { return text().isEmpty() ? QSize(4,4): QLabel::sizeHint(); };
00076 };

00078 //
00079 // KviWindowListBase
00080 //
00081 // The base class for the WindowList implementations
00082 // This is the basic interface that all the external classes should see
00083 //
00084 
00085 class KVIRC_API KviWindowListBase : public QDockWidget
00086 {
00087         Q_OBJECT
00088 public:
00089         KviWindowListBase();
00090         virtual ~KviWindowListBase();
00091 protected:
00092         KviFrame * m_pFrm;
00093         QTimer   * m_pActivityMeterTimer;
00094         KviWindowListTitleWidget  * m_pTitleWidget;
00095         Qt::DockWidgetArea currentArea;
00096 public:
00097         virtual KviWindowListItem * addItem(KviWindow *){ return 0; };
00098         virtual bool removeItem(KviWindowListItem *){ return false; };
00099         virtual void setActiveItem(KviWindowListItem *){};
00100         virtual KviWindowListItem * firstItem(){ return 0; };
00101         virtual KviWindowListItem * lastItem(void) { return 0; }
00102         virtual KviWindowListItem * nextItem(){ return 0; };
00103         virtual KviWindowListItem * prevItem(void) { return 0; }
00104         virtual KviWindowListItem * item(int number);
00105         virtual bool setIterationPointer(KviWindowListItem *){ return false; };
00106         virtual void switchWindow(bool bNext,bool bInContextOnly,bool bHighlightedOnly=false);
00107         virtual void updatePseudoTransparency(){};
00108         virtual void applyOptions();
00109         virtual void wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *e);
00110         static void getTextForConsole(QString &szText,KviConsole * pConsole);
00111         Qt::DockWidgetArea currentDockArea() { return currentArea; };
00112 protected slots:
00113         virtual void updateActivityMeter();
00114         void updateDockLocation(Qt::DockWidgetArea newArea);
00115 };

00126 {

00135 protected:
00136         virtual void mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *e);
00137         virtual void contextMenuEvent(QContextMenuEvent *e);
00138         virtual void drawButtonLabel(QPainter *p);
00139         virtual void paintEvent(QPaintEvent * e);
00140 public:
00141         virtual bool active(){ return m_bActive; };
00142         virtual void highlight(int iLevel = 1);
00143         virtual void unhighlight();
00144         virtual void setProgress(int progress);
00145         virtual void captionChanged();
00146 protected:
00147         void setActive(bool bActive);
00148 protected slots:
00149         void tipRequest(KviDynamicToolTip *tip,const QPoint &pnt);
